objects.specification: A flat floor plane with a medium wood tone textured surface, showing realistic wood grain and plank pattern, polished finish without visible seams, suitable for a classroom interior.
A flat ceiling panel with a smooth white plaster finish, subtle edge details where panels meet, minimalistic appearance, ideal for mounting light fixtures.
A large flat wall panel painted in light pastel blue, featuring a smooth matte texture and crisp edges, free of decorations except mounting elements for equipment.
A large flat wall panel painted in light pastel blue, featuring a smooth matte texture and crisp edges, free of decorations except for posters or mounting points.
A flat side wall painted in light pastel blue, with a uniform matte finish and smooth surface, serving as a background for decor elements.
A flat side wall painted in light pastel blue, with a uniform matte finish and smooth surface, suitable for window installation.
A large rectangular matte blackboard with a thin wooden trim frame, non-reflective surface for chalk, subtle beveled edge along perimeter.
A round wall clock with a white face, thin black frame, bold black numerals and simple black hands, minimalistic mounting bracket behind.
A large rectangular teacher desk in natural wood tone with a smooth finish, sturdy panel legs, modesty panel underneath and a slightly rounded tabletop edge.
An ergonomic teacher chair in dark gray with a cushioned seat and backrest, metal frame legs, subtle texture on upholstery and a supportive contour design.
A simple rectangular student desk in natural wood tone with slender square legs, smooth finish, modesty panel and slightly rounded edges.
A student chair in dark gray with a molded plastic seat and backrest, tubular metal frame, minimal detailing and slight matte texture.

A tall bookshelf in natural wood finish with multiple evenly spaced shelves, each shelf filled with assorted colorful book spines, realistic wood grain detail on sides.
A world map poster with vibrant country colors, slim black frame, slightly glossy laminated surface and subtle layer of protective coating.
A large window with clear transparent glass panes, thin white painted frame, subtle reflection highlights and narrow mullions dividing panes.
Curtains made of light pastel colored fabric with gentle pleated folds, slight translucency, hanging rod loops along top edge and subtle drape texture.
